titleStmt.title: The animadverter animadverted: or, Brief observations on animadversions Published by Thomas Harlackenden, Esquire. Intitluled, Animadversions on several material passages in a book written by Sir Nathanael Povvel, Baronet. By the same authour.
titleStmt.author: Powell, Nathaniel, Sir, d. 1675.
Harlackenden, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
